column1: “I take full responsibility.”  President Trump finally admits his failure on COVID. #Debates2020
He’s known about COVID since January. He has no clear plan. 220000 Americans are dead. He has no business being president. #Debates2020
Rooting for my Sister Kamala Harris tonight (from an appropriate social distance of course)! https://t.co/XZt08jZ0sZ

This election comes down to one question: Who is on your side?  After tonight the choice couldn’t be clearer.  President Trump isn't worried about us. He isn’t worried about COVID victims. He's worried about himself.   Joe Biden is on our side. He’s who we need. #Debates2020

President Trump​ knowingly and willingly lied to the American people about the threat COVID posed to our country. For months.  He panicked.  He didn’t have a plan then and he made clear tonight – more than six months into the pandemic – that he still has no plan. #Debates2020

Trump’s poor planning has also led to 200000 deaths from COVID-19: an absolutely unacceptable number.   Regardless of what he says about his plan one thing’s for sure: @realDonaldTrump doesn’t care about your health. Actions speak louder than words.

“Amid a grim surge in coronavirus in her home state and city US Congresswoman Alma Adams said Wednesday that President Donald Trump’s approach to the virus is ‘no lives matter.’” https://t.co/NfJSW906pP

The Coronavirus has killed enough Americans to fill Bank of America Stadium and the Spectrum Center. COVID-19 isn’t a partisan issue: it’s a life and death issue. Right now we don’t need a photo opp; we need protective equipment and protections for workers.

I want to know how you’re doing.  I don’t want you to make a campaign donation or volunteer. I want to hear how you’re coping how you’re struggling how you’re living during COVID-19.  Tell your story below or simply check in and let me know you’re ok: https://t.co/ptkYa71Ln6

In case you missed it I had coffee with Elizabeth Warren (@ewarren) yesterday and we talked about coronavirus Black Maternal Health and how @FirstDogBailey is doing (he's doing great). https://t.co/y4XvKsPmGx

.@JoeBiden’s coronavirus plan: “Ensures that every person whether insured or uninsured will not have to pay a dollar out-of-pocket for visits related to COVID-19 testing treatment preventative services and any eventual vaccine.” https://t.co/vo2wAk4gdA
